subject: AM Brief: Mon, 31 Jul 2023
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was risk-on. Tech stocks rallied amid concerns over Moroccan Dirham.

**Key Event Today:** FOMC Minutes at 15:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Blick, Kerluke and Goodwin downgraded to Overweight
- Bloomberg: Fuga culpo alius tergo celo demo vindico suscipit.
- AFR: Aiunt curvo tempore thermae thalassinus non.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.

subject: URGENT: Portfolio Adjustment for QBE
body:
Team,

Client instruction just came down. We need to hedge our exposure to the small-cap portfolio.

Please drop everything and model out the implications. I need execution levels and a full impact analysis on my desk in 2 hours.

Sarah Connor

--
Sarah Connor
Managing Director, Portfolio Manager
J.P. Morgan Asset Management
Sydney, Australia
Tel: +61 2 9003 8888

subject: Auto Reply: Out of Office
body:
Thank you for your email.

--
This is an automated response.

I am out of the office on annual leave from Mon Sep 08 2025 07:49:05 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time) to Sun Oct 05 2025 09:34:15 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time) with no email access. For urgent matters, please contact Thomas Francis at thomas.francis@jpmorgan.com.

Otherwise, I will respond to your email upon my return.

Thank you.

subject: Phishing Alert: Fake Compliance Training Email
body:
Security Alert.

Be aware of a phishing campaign using a fake 'Compliance Training' email. Do not click links from 'jpmorgan.compliance.training@gmail.com'. If clicked, contact IT Security immediately.

--
J.P. Morgan Technology - APAC
This is an automated message. Do not reply.
For support, please contact the IT Service Desk.
